about_the_game:
Shipwrecked offers a rich and unique strategy experience, as you vie to control numerous islands and resources, and control your ships in frantic turn-based battles. Construct buildings and outposts on islands to increase your influence on those surrounding them, and construct trade routes to make sure that all of your ill-gotten gains are transported smoothly, but watch out, if your ships are left unprotected, they will be exposed to deadly buccaneers and other pirate fleets.
  • Manage your own empire in a week-to-week turn-based experience.
  • Control each island and ship down to the individual crewmate or building, or hire captains to do it for you.
  • 11 Individual playable characters, each with their own abilities, skills, and ambitions.
  • Play as a pirate, a navy, a joint-stock company, or a privateer.
  • Control each ship in turn-based combat when trying to conquer others, or defending your own island from conquerors.

short_description: Fight your way to establish yourself as the greatest pirate in a newly discovered archipelago, battling numerous other pirate factions and navies along the way in strategic turn-based combat, all while managing your own resources and armada. Crown the true king of pirates in your own way.
